duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide outstanding customer service and support to meet or exceed customer service goals
Engage customers warmly, use suggestive selling techniques, and meet or exceed solicitation and clienteling goals
Utilize digital technology to enhance the customer shopping experience, including mobile devices, digital point-of-sale, and the Belk App
Meet or exceed personal sales goals, increase units sold per transaction, identify and reduce shrinkage, and maintain store standards
Support the Operations Team in unpacking and displaying new merchandise, following procedures for all systems, and complying with store policies
Assist with non-sell duties as assigned by Sales Team Manager
